leadText.title: Submit Import Substitution
leadText.description: Send information about import-substituting products by filling out the form and participate in procurement procedures of the Inter RAO Group companies

document.title: The list of foreign products
document.group: The list of foreign products which are prioritized for import substitution and recommended for development in production by Russian companies has been approved (the list is updated annually):

bannerText.title: Need Import Substitution
text: The information on the needs for import-substituting equipment, engineering products and software products critical for the technological processes of TEK-Torg organizations is indicated in the Automated Information System (AIS) and updated in accordance with the letter of the Ministry of Energy of Russia dated December 30, 2015 No. АТ-15171/02 «On Submission of Information to the Automated Information System „Import Substitution Technologies and Projects“ by the Inter RAO Group companies».

When planning the purchase of foreign products, the Inter RAO Group companies carry out a mandatory analysis of the possibility of its substitution with domestic products that are equivalent by technical characteristics and consumer properties.

When conducting procurement procedures, in order to assign the purchased products the status of Russian origin, the level of its localization is determined. The calculation of the localization level is carried out by the organization — a potential supplier of products in accordance with the Methodology «Calculation of the localization level of goods, works, services».

links.text: Go to the AIS “Import Substitution Technologies and Projects”

documents.title: The AIS User’s Instruction for industrial enterprises
Methodology MT-156-2 «Calculation of the level of localization of goods, works, services»
